27  package org.apache.http.impl.client.cache;
28  
29  import java.io.Closeable;
30  import java.io.File;
31  import java.io.IOException;
32  import java.io.InputStream;
33  import java.io.OutputStream;
34  import java.io.RandomAccessFile;
35  import java.nio.channels.FileChannel;
36  
37  import org.apache.http.annotation.Immutable;
38  
39  @Immutable
40  class IOUtils {
41  
42      static void copy(final InputStream in, final OutputStream out) throws IOException {
43          byte[] buf = new byte[2048];
44          int len;
45          while ((len = in.read(buf)) != -1) {
46              out.write(buf, 0, len);
47          }
48      }
49  
50      static void closeSilently(final Closeable closable) {
51          try {
52              closable.close();
53          } catch (IOException ignore) {
54          }
55      }
56  
57      static void copyAndClose(final InputStream in, final OutputStream out) throws IOException {
58          try {
59              copy(in, out);
60              in.close();
61              out.close();
62          } catch (IOException ex) {
63              closeSilently(in);
64              closeSilently(out);
65              // Propagate the original exception
66              throw ex;
67          }
68      }
69  
70      static void copyFile(final File in, final File out) throws IOException {
71          RandomAccessFile f1 = new RandomAccessFile(in, "r");
72          RandomAccessFile f2 = new RandomAccessFile(out, "rw");
73          try {
74              FileChannel c1 = f1.getChannel();
75              FileChannel c2 = f2.getChannel();
76              try {
77                  c1.transferTo(0, f1.length(), c2);
78                  c1.close();
79                  c2.close();
80              } catch (IOException ex) {
81                  closeSilently(c1);
82                  closeSilently(c2);
83                  // Propagate the original exception
84                  throw ex;
85              }
86              f1.close();
87              f2.close();
88          } catch (IOException ex) {
89              closeSilently(f1);
90              closeSilently(f2);
91              // Propagate the original exception
92              throw ex;
93          }
94      }
95  
96  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
